payment-number.title: Number of Photos
payment-number.coupon: Please check if you have any coupons

cash.title: INSERT MONEY
cash.instruction: Please insert the exact cash you would like to pay.
cash.warning: This machine does not return funds.

QR.title: SCAN QR CODE TO PAY
QR.instruction: Scan the QR code with your
QR.instruction1: app, enter the payment amount in the local currency, review and click pay.
QR.warning: The QR code to pay is unique for each transaction. Do not send funds to the same address more than once.
QR.subtitle: SCAN TO PAY

Promo.title: ENTER A PROMOTION CODE
Promo.subtitle: Enter your promotional code in the space provided, and select 'REDEEM'. Your code will be automatically applied to your order.
